channel.title: Does Anyone Need Help With A Server On The Server Status Page
channel.description:
[b]Here Is The Link To The Status Page[/b] http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php
[b]Ok, Guys I Am Making This Topic Specificly For Helping People Advertise,On The Server Status Page On The Link Above.. [/b]
I Got Experience, So Don't Think I Am Going To Say "This Server SUCKS" Or "This Server Is Horribly Laggy.."
[i]Ok Here Are The Steps I Do When I Am Advertising A Server[/i]
-First, I Put The Server Name,IP Then The Port.. Or If You Have A Download Link I Will Post That -Then, I Post The Intro For Ie-(I Will Post About The Server's Lagg Rate Or When The Server Is On Or Off,Etc... -After, I Post The Features And Pics.. -Finally, I Post The Mods,Admins,Co-Owners And Owners And I Say "When You Get On Read ::rules"
[b]If You Need Any Help With This, Please Reply.[/b]

item.title: Does Anyone Need Help With A Server On The Server Status Page
item.dc:creator: @DuhPk DuhPk
item.description:
@DuhPk wrote:

This is
RS2 Server Development/Help

Not RS2 Server Status Checker Development/Help
I can tell your trying to get a sticky

Read full topic
item.source: Does Anyone Need Help With A Server On The Server Status Page

                                  [b]Here Is The Link To The Status Page[/b]
                              http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php

Ok, Guys I Am Making This Topic Specificly For Helping People Advertise,On The Server Status Page On The Link Above… 

       I Got Experience, So Don't Think I Am Going To Say "This Server SUCKS" Or "This Server Is Horribly Laggy.."

-Then, I Post The Intro For Ie-(I Will Post About The Server’s Lagg Rate Or When The Server Is On Or Off,Etc…
